com.b2international.snowowl.eventbus

Interface IMessage


  • public interface IMessage
    Represents a message to be send/receive over/from the IEventBus.
    Since:
    3.1

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String address()
      Returns the address this message is belongs to.
      Object body()
      Returns the body of this IMessage, can be used for simple types with explicit cast.
      <T> T body(Class<T> type)
      Returns the body of this message.
      <T> T body(Class<T> type, ClassLoader classLoader) 
      void fail(Object failure)
      Returns a failure message to the replyAddress.
      boolean isSend()
      Returns if this message is a send only message.
      boolean isSucceeded()
      Returns true if the original message was successfully delivered to the address, false if some error happened, in this case the body(Class) method should return the Exception for this error.
      void reply(Object message)
      Replies with the given message.
      String replyAddress()
      Returns the replyAddress for this message.
      void setAddress(String address)
      Sets the address for this message;

    • Method Detail

      • body

        Object body()
        Returns the body of this IMessage, can be used for simple types with explicit cast.
        Returns:
        Throws:
        ClassNotFoundException

      • body

        <T> T body(Class<T> type)
        Returns the body of this message. If the body was not resolved already then resolves it using the ClassLoader of the given Class , after resolution the method always return the resolved object with the given type.
        Returns:

      • isSucceeded

        boolean isSucceeded()
        Returns true if the original message was successfully delivered to the address, false if some error happened, in this case the body(Class) method should return the Exception for this error.
